title: User Authentication Success for All Roles
description: Verify that users with client, venue_owner, and admin roles can successfully authenticate using valid credentials and receive appropriate JWT tokens granting access rights.

steps.description: Navigate to login endpoint
Submit valid credentials for client role
Receive valid JWT token with client role claims
Submit valid credentials for venue_owner role
Receive valid JWT token with venue_owner role claims
Submit valid credentials for admin role
Receive valid JWT token with admin role claims

title: User Authentication Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that submitting invalid credentials prevents authentication and returns appropriate error messages without issuing JWT tokens.

steps.description: Navigate to login endpoint
Submit invalid username and password
Receive authentication failure response and no JWT token is issued

title: Venue Owner Multi-step Registration with Valid Data
description: Verify venue owner can complete multi-step registration with valid inputs including email verification, photo uploads, and facility selections resulting in successful onboarding.

steps.description: Navigate to venue owner registration page
Complete basic info form with valid business details
Proceed to next step without validation errors
Upload multiple valid photos for the venue
Photos are uploaded successfully with correct preview
Select multiple facilities from provided options
Facilities are recorded correctly
Submit completed registration form
Receive onboarding confirmation and email verification prompt
Complete email verification process
User status changes to onboarded venue_owner with access to venue management

title: Venue Owner Registration Validation Errors Handling
description: Verify form validation displays appropriate error messages for invalid or missing fields during venue owner multi-step registration.

steps.description: Attempt to proceed without filling mandatory basic info fields
Display validation errors highlighting required fields
Upload invalid file types or unsupported image formats in photo upload step
Show error messages specifying allowed formats and rejections
Submit multi-step registration with incomplete facility selections when required
Display appropriate error prompt urging facility selection

title: Client Simplified Registration and Login
description: Validate that a new client can register via the simplified workflow and subsequently log in successfully with issued JWT token.

steps.description: Navigate to client registration page
Provide valid user details and submit registration form
Client account is created successfully
Login with newly created client credentials
Receive valid JWT token with client role claims

title: Homepage Hot Matches Display and Day Navigation
description: Check homepage displays current hot matches and allows user to navigate matches by day, updating venue recommendations accordingly.

steps.description: Navigate to homepage
Verify hot matches are displayed prominently for current day
Use day navigation controls to browse different match days
Matches and venue listings update dynamically according to selected day

title: Venue Search with Filters and Map Integration
description: Verify venue listing page supports search by location, filtering by facilities or match hosting, and proper functioning of map integration showing venue locations.

steps.description: Navigate to venue listing page
Enter a location query and apply filters (e.g., facility types, match hosting status)
Venue list updates to match criteria
Map displays markers corresponding to filtered venues
Click venue markers on map
Venue details preview or navigation triggered appropriately

title: Venue Detail Page Display and Photo Carousel
description: Validate venue detail page shows venue info, photo carousel works including multi-photo uploads, and match announcements are displayed correctly.

steps.description: Open a venue detail page
Venue business info, address, and facilities are visible
Photo carousel loads all uploaded images and is navigable with controls
Match announcements linked to this venue are displayed

title: Booking System - Match-specific Table Reservations
description: Verify clients can submit booking requests for tables specific to a sports match, and system validates inputs and reserves appropriately.

steps.description: Navigate to venue detail page containing booking form
Complete booking form selecting match, desired date/time, table count, and client info
Form validates all fields successfully
Submit booking request
Booking is confirmed and stored correctly with venue and match association

title: Booking Form Validation and Error Handling
description: Confirm that booking forms detect missing or invalid input fields and display appropriate error messages without submitting invalid data.

steps.description: Open booking form without selecting mandatory match or date
Validation errors prevent submission and highlight missing fields
Enter invalid data (e.g., negative table count, past date) in booking form
Form displays detailed validation messages indicating correct input requirements

title: Admin Dashboard User and Venue Management
description: Verify that admin users can access dashboard features including viewing user lists, venue listings, managing bookings and matches with proper role-based authorization.

steps.description: Login as admin user
Navigate to admin dashboard
Dashboard displays sections for users, venues, bookings and matches
Attempt to edit user, venue, booking, and match records
Records update successfully and changes reflect in listings

title: Multi-Tenant Data Isolation Enforcement
description: Ensure that venue-specific data is isolated per tenant, such that users and venue owners can access only their own data, verified on backend and API layers.

steps.description: Login as venue owner for tenant A
Attempt to access venue data belonging to tenant B
Access is denied or data is not returned confirming tenant data isolation
Verify API responses contain data only associated with authenticated tenant
Data segregation enforcement confirmed

title: UI Color Palette Compliance and Accessibility
description: Verify that UI adheres to Gazzetta dello Sport color palette and meets WCAG 2.1 AA standards for color contrast, keyboard navigation, and screen reader accessibility.

steps.description: Run automated color palette audit on key screens and components
UI uses specified CSS variables and color codes matching brand guidelines
Test keyboard navigation across forms, menus, and interactive controls
All interactive elements are reachable and operable via keyboard
Use screen reader to navigate major UI screens
All important content and controls are announced clearly and logically

title: Performance Benchmarks Verification
description: Confirm that key pages meet loading time and interactivity performance requirements: LCP <2.5s, FID <100ms, CLS <0.1 across supported browsers.

steps.description: Measure Largest Contentful Paint (LCP) on homepage, venue listing, and detail pages
LCP is below 2.5 seconds for each tested page
Measure First Input Delay (FID) responding to user interactions in booking forms
FID is below 100ms
Analyze Cumulative Layout Shift (CLS) during page load and dynamic content inserts
CLS score remains below 0.1 ensuring stable UI

title: Cross-Browser Compatibility Testing
description: Validate platform functionality and UI rendering on latest versions of Chrome, Safari, Firefox, and Edge browsers to confirm consistent user experience.

steps.description: Access key user flows (login, registration, booking, venue browsing) on Chrome
All flows work without UI or functional defects
Repeat above flows on Safari, Firefox, and Edge
Functional parity and UI consistency verified across all browsers
